attributes.action: Facebook de-activation for 24 hours in order for Facebook to remove sick pages.
attributes.additional_details:
I am trying to gather as many signatures as possible that is willing to de-activate their Facebook account for 24 hours.

This is only a temporary de-activation, The reason behind this is, there has been quite a number of awful web pages created by sick individuals and Facebook are doing nothing about it.

These pages are causing so much hurt and upset.

I believe that if enough people de-activate their accounts for 24 hours in a protest to get the pages removed Facebook will have no other alternative but to listen.

These pages are targeting dead babies/real life children with illnesses.

Once the 24 hours is up then you can log back into facebook as usual.

We will need to get as much coverage as possible, I.e this will need to be spread across the world in order for it to work.

A few of the groups are:

https://www.facebook.com/DeadBabyJokes

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Adalia-Rose-is-Ugly/415876705116107
